| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type                           | Default   |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | ------------------------------ | --------- |

| `gap`       | `gap`        |             | `number`                       | `0`       |
| `grow`      | `grow`       |             | `boolean`                      | `false`   |
| `halign`    | `halign`     |             | `"center" \| "end" \| "start"` | `'start'` |
| `spaceUnit` | `space-unit` |             | `number`                       | `4`       |
| `valign`    | `valign`     |             | `"center" \| "end" \| "start"` | `'start'` |
| `width`     | `width`      |             | `"auto" \| "full"`             | `'auto'`  |
